utils module¶

async utils.fetch(session, url)¶

Asynchronously fetches the content of a list of URLs

Parameters

  • session (aiohttp.ClientSession()) – asyncio session event

  • url (string) – A URL

async utils.gather_urls(urls)¶

Creates a collection of URLs to be fetched assynchronously and fetches the content by calling the fetch method.

Parameters

urls (list or iterator of a dict.keys()) – Can take a list of urls or a collection of all the keys in a python dict.

utils.load_dataset(filepath)¶

Load the dataset (JSON) from directory

Parameters

filepath (string) – Absolute path of the file

utils.parse_args(args)¶

Takes in arguments for running the url_regex_matcher.py file.

Parameters

args (list) – A list of filepath and interval

Filepath: Absolute path of the file Interval: Time at which the scheduler periodically runs the regex checks

utils.regex_matcher(filepath)¶

Get the data from dictionary and return a output dictionary with regex matches for every url and corresponding REGEX

Parameters

filepath (string) – Absolute path of the input JSON file

utils.run(filepath, time)¶

Util function used to schedule the whole process periodically, Runs the different util functions to input, process and save output JSON file

Parameters

  • filepath (string) – Absolute path of the input JSON file

  • time (string) – Timestamp with date and time

utils.save_output(data, time)¶

Gets the output dictionary and saves the output with a timestamp

Parameters

  • data (dict) – Output dictionary with regex matches for every url and corresponding REGEX

  • time (string) – Timestamp with date and time

Regex Matcher
